resources.string: Please check your WIFI is turned on and connected

Tab 1 - Main Transport Control 
. comp/layer focus 
. . (comp/layer) play direction 
. . (current clip) QWERTY position jump 
. . (current clip) beatlooper (delesect all to turn off) 
. composition byass, clear, opacity.volume slider (with up.down) 
. bpm tap, resync, paused 
 
Tab 2 - Layer Control 
. 4x layers, from right to left (there is good reason for this) 
. . slider (with up.down), bypass, solo, clear 
. A.B crossfader (with A.B) 
 
Tab 3 - Clip Trigger 
. column triggers 1 to 8 
. clip triggers 1 to 8, 4 layers (from bottom to top, to match Resolume) 
 
Tab 4 - Composition Fx 
. composition Fx links 1 to 8 (with up.down) with bypass

This app is for basic control of Resolume 
 
Written by matt standish 
Copyright (©) 2016 
M T S Standish | ksp 
 
This software is provided on an AS-IS-BASIS 
 
 
IMPORTANT 
This app cannot currently cope with bundles 
Make sure Bundles are turned OFF in Resolume OSC Preferences 
 
 
. A few things left to fix. Not optimised for tablets yet. 
 
. The layout is intentionally minimal. There is not much screen space on a mobile device, and there are not many different ways to re-arrange things in grids. 
 
. Communication is done via OSC/UDP over WIFI/LAN. Resolume accepts input from many devices at once, this enables several people to VJ together pretty easily (..but unfortunately Resolume can only talk back to 1 device)
We respect data privacy, no data is stored by this app \n

JavaOSC 
Copyright (©) 2002–2014, C. Ramakrishnan / Illposed Software 
All rights reserved 
http://www.illposed.com/software/javaosc.html 
 
 
Android Supprt Library v7 
http://developer.android.com/tools/support-library/index.html

IMPORTANT 
This app cannot currently cope with bundles 
Make sure Bundles are turned OFF in Resolume OSC Preferences 
 
If it's still not working.. 
. If you have a firewall please allow the app through 
. Some phones may require root access 
. Delete and re-install (settings can get mucked up easily, this will make sure that everything is reset)
admin stats, for those times you just gotta know
Do you really want to reset all buttons and sliders?
Do you really want to reset everything?
Tab selection buttons to the left or the right
Reverse the order in which tabs are selected
Reverse the order of sliders (and buttons) on the layer control tab
Swap the sliders and buttons around (left to right) on the layer control tab
